items.title: Operation Code at Axon
items.body: You're invited to our Operation Code Meetup, located at and hosted by Axon in Seattle! Our speakers will be sharing their experiences and career and technical insights that will help give our guests the edge in building their careers.

items.title: Jameel Matin
items.body: "Operation Code has helped me navigate my tech career from choosing the right code school to solving complex software problems. They helped bring me out of homelessness and into a six-figure salary as a full stack engineer for a venture capital firm." Jameel Matin, USMC, Software Engineer

items.title: Sean McBride
items.body: "If you had told me when I separated from the military that I would eventually be the lead developer on a pretty complex piece of software, I would have told you that you were nuts. However, several years and pivots later here I am. While it was a hard slog to get here, I chalk up much of my success as due to Operation Code.
